quests.desc: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First stop, try to take a trip west. Then, head south. With that done, venture east. Then, go to the south. Then, make an effort to move east. And then, travel south. After that, attempt to move west. After that, go to the west. Following that, move north. After that, pick up the pillow from the floor of the bedroom. Alright, thanks!

infos.name: bedroom
infos.desc:
You are in a bedroom. An ordinary one.

 You can make out a safe.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The safe contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The safe is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You rest your hand against a wall, but you miss the wall and fall onto a bed. What a coincidence, weren't you just thinking about a bed? [if there is something on the s_0]On the bed you can make out [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0]But there isn't a thing on it. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the bed.[end if] If you haven't noticed it already, there seems to be something there by the wall, it's a bookshelf. [if there is something on the s_1]On the bookshelf you make out [a list of things on the s_1].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of junk. Aw, here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if]

There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: basement
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a basement. A normal one.

 You can make out a cabinet. You look around you, at all the containers and supporters, doors and objects, and you think to yourself. Why? Why Textworld?[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The cabinet contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The cabinet is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] Oh wow! Is that what I think it is? It is! It's a table. The table is normal.[if there is something on the s_2] On the table you can see [a list of things on the s_2].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2] Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: cookery
infos.desc:
You arrive in a cookery. A normal one.

 What's that over there? It looks like it's a fridge.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The fridge contains [a list of things in the c_2]. Hmmm... what else, what else?[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] The fridge is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: studio
infos.desc:
You've just sauntered into a studio.



There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: garage
infos.desc:
You arrive in a garage. A standard kind of place.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: parlor
infos.desc:
You've entered a parlor.

 You make out [if c_3 is locked]a locked[else if c_3 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] Microsoft chest right there by you.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The Microsoft chest contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] The Microsoft chest is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You can make out a coffer.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The coffer contains [a list of things in the c_4].[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] The coffer is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

 There is [if d_5 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading east. There is [if d_6 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading west.

infos.name: kitchenette
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a kitchenette. An usual one.



 There is [if d_6 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading east. There is [if d_7 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading north.

infos.name: playroom
infos.desc:
You are in a playroom. It seems to be pretty normal here. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here.

 Oh, great. Here's a couch. [if there is something on the s_3]On the couch you see [a list of things on the s_3]. You shudder, but continue examining the room.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3]The couch appears to be empty.[end if]

 There is [if d_4 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading east. There is [if d_5 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading west.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
You're now in the shower.

 Were you looking for a TextWorld locker? Because look over there, it's a TextWorld locker.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The TextWorld locker contains [a list of things in the c_5].[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] The TextWorld locker is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You make out a shelf. The shelf is typical.[if there is something on the s_4] On the shelf you make out [a list of things on the s_4]. Something scurries by right in the corner of your eye. Probably nothing.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4] But the thing is empty.[end if]

 There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading east. There is [if d_4 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading west.

infos.name: cubicle
infos.desc:
You arrive in a cubicle. A normal one. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.



 There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading west. There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading north.

infos.name: office
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in an office.

 You make out a mantelpiece. The mantelpiece is typical.[if there is something on the s_5] On the mantelpiece you see [a list of things on the s_5].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5] However, the mantelpiece, like an empty mantelpiece, has nothing on it.[end if]

 There is [if d_7 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading south. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: closet
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a closet. An ordinary one.

 You make out a rack. The rack is usual.[if there is something on the s_6] On the rack you can see [a list of things on the s_6]. Suddenly, you bump your head on the ceiling, but it's not such a bad bump that it's going to prevent you from looking at objects and even things.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6] The rack appears to be empty. Aw, here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: kitchen
infos.desc:
This might come as a shock to you, but you've just moved into a kitchen.

 You can make out a freezer.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The freezer contains [a list of things in the c_6].[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] The freezer is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] stone gateway leading south. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east.

infos.name: bar
infos.desc:
You've entered a bar.



There is an unguarded exit to the south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: bedchamber
infos.desc:
You are in a bedchamber. A typical kind of place.



 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] stone gateway leading north. There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unguarded exit to the south.

infos.name: washroom
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a washroom. A standard one.

 Oh, great. Here's a box.[if c_7 is open and there is something in the c_7] The box contains [a list of things in the c_7].[end if][if c_7 is open and the c_7 contains nothing] What a letdown! The box is empty![end if] You make out a board. The board is normal.[if there is something on the s_7] On the board you can make out [a list of things on the s_7].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_7] Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. Hm. Oh well[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: spare room
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a spare room. A typical kind of place. You begin to take stock of what's here.

 You can make out a workbench. The workbench is normal.[if there is something on the s_8] On the workbench you can see [a list of things on the s_8]. Suddenly, you bump your head on the ceiling, but it's not such a bad bump that it's going to prevent you from looking at objects and even things.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_8] Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the north.

infos.name: launderette
infos.desc:
Well I'll be, you are in a place we're calling a launderette. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building.



 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] stone passageway leading north. There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading south.

infos.name: cookhouse
infos.desc:
This cookhouse you have just entered is definitely typical.

 You can make out a pan. Now why would someone leave that there? The pan is typical.[if there is something on the s_9] On the pan you can make out [a list of things on the s_9]. Huh, weird.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_9] But there isn't a thing on it. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the pan! oh well.[end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] stone passageway leading south. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north.

infos.name: attic
infos.desc:
Ah, the attic. This is some kind of attic, really great standard vibes in this place, a wonderful standard atmosphere. And now, well, you're in it.

 You can see a type M safe.[if c_8 is open and there is something in the c_8] The type M safe contains [a list of things in the c_8].[end if][if c_8 is open and the c_8 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.desc: The passageway looks ominous. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

objective: Welcome to another life changing episode of TextWorld! Here is your task for today. First step, move west. Once you succeed at that, make an effort to go to the south. Then, go to the east. And then, take a trip south. Following that, make an effort to go to the east. After that, attempt to take a trip south. That done, go west. Okay, and then, make an attempt to head west. Then, attempt to go to the north. That done, pick-up the pillow from the floor of the bedroom. And once you've done that, you win!
